attributes.action: Cancel All BTEC and Vocational Exams in 2021, Provide Teacher Assessment Grades.
attributes.additional_details: When news of A-Level and GCSE exams being cancelled was spread on the 4th of January, BTEC and Vocational students were- yet again- forgotten by the government. We've been told to go for our exams, which completely degrades the stay at home message. This is not fair. In the March lockdown, BTEC and vocational students were provided with their predicted or teacher-assessed grade. We want to know why this isn't happening and why we're being put into danger.
attributes.background: When news of A-Level and GCSE exams being cancelled was spread on the 4th of January, BTEC and Vocational students were- yet again- forgotten by the government. We've been told to go for our exams, which completely degrades the stay at home message.
